description: This file contains a minified JavaScript library 'DUEL' version 0.9.7, which provides a framework for creating reactive views and data binding, along with application-specific code for a TodoMVC app implementation using DUEL.

classes.name: y
classes.description: A wrapper class for a value, with a custom toString method.

classes.name: p
classes.description: A class for handling string and DOM serialization, representing text or HTML content.

methods.name: viewData
methods.description: Returns filtered view data based on 'completed' or 'active' status.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new task with a unique ID and default 'not completed' status.

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Edits the title of a task identified by ID.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of a task.

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Sets all tasks to a specified completion status.
